languages.text: {n}Со звериным воем Каллигос вздымает над головой оружие.{/n} "Да прольется кровь тех, кто встанет на нашем пути!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Со звериным воем Каллигос вздымает над головой оружие.{/n} "Да прольется кровь тех, кто встанет на нашем пути!"

languages.text: {n}With an animalistic howl, Calligos raises his weapon over his head.{/n} "Whoever stands in our way, they shall bleed!"
languages.original_text: {n}Со звериным воем Каллигос вздымает над головой оружие.{/n} "Да прольется кровь тех, кто встанет на нашем пути!"

traits.locale_text: {n}With an animal howl, Calligos raises his weapon over his head.{/n} "Whoever stands in our way, they shall bleed!"
{n}With an animal howl, Calligos raises his weapon over his head.{/n} "Whoever stands in our way, they shall bleed!"
{n}With an animalistic howl, Calligos raises his weapon over his head.{/n} "Whoever stands in our way, they shall bleed!"
{n}With an animalistic howl, Calligos raises his weapon over his head.{/n} "Whoever stands in our way, they shall bleed!"
{n}With an animalistic howl, Calligos raises his weapon over his head.{/n} "Whoever stands in our way, they shall bleed!"
{n}With an animalistic howl, Calligos raises his weapon over his head.{/n} "Whoever stands in our way, they shall bleed!"

languages.text: {n}Profiriendo un aullido bestial, Calligos blande su arma por encima de la cabeza.{/n} «¡Quienquiera que se interponga en nuestro camino, sangrará!».
languages.original_text: {n}With an animalistic howl, Calligos raises his weapon over his head.{/n} "Whoever stands in our way, they shall bleed!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Profiriendo un aullido bestial, Calligos blande su arma por encima de la cabeza.{/n} «¡Quienquiera que se interponga en nuestro camino, sangrará!».

languages.text: {n}卡里戈斯发出野兽般的咆哮，将武器举过头顶。{/n}“谁敢挡我们的路，谁就得血流成河！”
languages.original_text: {n}With an animalistic howl, Calligos raises his weapon over his head.{/n} "Whoever stands in our way, they shall bleed!"

traits.locale_text: {n}卡里戈斯发出野兽般的咆哮，将武器举过头顶。{/n}“谁敢挡我们的路，谁就得血流成河！”

languages.text: {n}Calligos brandit son arme au-dessus de sa tête en poussant un hurlement sauvage.{/n} « Que ceux qui nous barrent la route périssent dans le sang ! »
languages.original_text: {n}With an animalistic howl, Calligos raises his weapon over his head.{/n} "Whoever stands in our way, they shall bleed!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos brandit son arme au-dessus de sa tête en poussant un hurlement sauvage.{/n} « Que ceux qui nous barrent la route périssent dans le sang ! »

languages.text: {n}獣のような遠吠えとともに、カリゴスは武器を頭上に掲げる。{/n}「俺たちの道を阻む者は、血に浴せ！」
languages.original_text: {n}With an animalistic howl, Calligos raises his weapon over his head.{/n} "Whoever stands in our way, they shall bleed!"

traits.locale_text: {n}獣のような遠吠えとともに、カリゴスは武器を頭上に掲げる。{/n}「俺たちの道を阻む者は、血に浴せ！」

languages.text: {n}Mit einem animalischen Heulen hebt Calligos die Waffe über seinen Kopf.{/n} "Wer sich uns in den Weg stellt, der wird bluten!"
languages.original_text: {n}With an animalistic howl, Calligos raises his weapon over his head.{/n} "Whoever stands in our way, they shall bleed!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einem animalischen Heulen hebt Calligos die Waffe über seinen Kopf.{/n} "Wer sich uns in den Weg stellt, der wird bluten!"

languages.text: {n}Hayvansı bir ulumayla Calligos, silahını başının üstüne kaldırıyor.{/n} "Yolumuza çıkan kimsenin kanı damarında kalmayacak!"
languages.original_text: {n}With an animalistic howl, Calligos raises his weapon over his head.{/n} "Whoever stands in our way, they shall bleed!"
